name: market for non-Fe-Co-metals, from used Li-ion battery, pyrometallurgical processing | non-Fe-Co-metals, from used Li-ion battery, pyrometallurgical processing | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/1466/documentation

This is a market activity, representing a treatment mix. In the case of products needing treatment, market mixes are supplied by the activities treating the product in the geography defined by the market, and they supply the activities needing to treat the product, as they have generated it as a by-product in the Undefined processes (present as a negative input in system models). Transport to the treating facility or losses are also accounted in this type of markets, when relevant.;This is the market for  'non-Fe-Co-metals, from used Li-ion battery, pyrometallurgical processing', in the Global geography.;This product is generally considered to be used at the production site.  Therefore, the market does not contain any transport.

The activity starts with the input from the treatment processes.

A market for a material for treatment (wastes or recyclables) ends with the provision of treatment, i.e. a mix of treatment providers, to activities that generate the reference product as a waste/by-product.
